algorithm: The new algorithm, named "Modified Power Algorithm," assigns scores to the bins by taking the power of the ratio of the item size to the remaining capacity of the bins with an exponent less than 1, aiming to prioritize bins with larger remaining capacity and minimize the number of used bins by assigning the item to the bin with the maximum score.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    # Calculate the ratio of item size to remaining bin capacity
    ratios = item / bins
    
    # Calculate the scores using the power of the ratios with an exponent less than 1
    scores = np.power(ratios, 0.8)
    
    return scores
